entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 12:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.7°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
